ValidationRule.description: Rejection reason & notes req'd @ closed lost
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
$Setup.Master_Validation__c.Account_Active__c && NOT(OR($RecordType.Name = "Health & Benefits", $RecordType.Name = "Scale", $RecordType.Name = "FS Direct")) &&
AND(
OR(ISBLANK(TEXT(Reason_for_Rejection__c)), ISBLANK(Rejection_Notes__c))
, ISCHANGED( StageName ), ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Closed Lost"))
